Introduction
This topic contains information on determining secondary SC, including by aggravation, including
provisions for SC under 38 CFR 3.310(a) and (b)
establishing causation for secondary SC
medical evidence required to show an NSC disability was aggravated by an SC disability
developing for medical evidence of baseline in NSC aggravation claims
information that must be included in the examinerâ€™s report for secondary SC based on aggravation
determining the extent to which an NSC disability was aggravated by an SC disability
, and
aggravation with a zero percent evaluation
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Secondary Service Connection (SC) and Aggravation of Non-Service-Connected (NSC) Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
